short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retrieves the open tabs' URLs, users can save them into a text file or store them into the local storage to open them again later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will access all the open tabs to grab the titles and the URLs of the displayed pages.
It will be then possible to download the URLs into a text file or to store these information inside the browser's storage to open the pages again in a second time.
